text: Nagrira mago sipisipi anenta'ma ahenaku'ma avre'za nevazageno agazonema huno neviaza hu'za navre'za vu'naze. Nagri'ma nahenakura amanage hu'za nanekea retro hu'nazana nagra kena antahi'na osu'noe. Ama zafa antagi atresunkeno raga'amo'a amne zankna nehina, ahe frisunkeno ama mopafina agia omanesie hu'za hu'naze.
